藾藾藾

藾字的基本解释

藾
lài
〔藾蒿〕即“艾蒿”。
荫：“南伯子綦游乎商之丘，见大木焉，有异，结驷千乘，隐将芘其所藾。”

藾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lài］
［《廣韻》落蓋切，去泰，來。］
(1)藾蒿。即苹。蒿类植物。
(2)荫庇。

藾字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　藾； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1067第15
【唐韻】盧蓋切，音賴。【爾雅·釋草】萍，藾蕭。【註】今藾蒿也。　又【韻會】䕃也。【莊子·人閒世】隱將芘其所藾。　【玉篇】又作䓶。

藾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
藾字的起名意思

暂无。

藾
Basic explanation of words
藾
lài
〔Artemisia chinensis〕 means "Artemisia wormwood".
Yin: "Nan Bozi Qi traveled to the hills of Shang, and saw the big wood Yan, there was a difference, and he made a thousand rides, and concealed what he did."
藾
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lài］
["Guangyun" Go to Thailand, come. ]
(1) Artemisia rotundifolia. That is, Ping. Artemisia plants.
(2) Shelter.
藾
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　藾; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1067 No. 15
[Tang Yun] Lu Gaiqie, sound Lai. 【Erya·Shucao】Ping, Ou Xiao. [Note] This is also Artemisia rotundifolia.　[Rhyme Club] Di Ye. [Zhuangzi·Renxian Shi] concealed pyrene and its origins.　【Jade Article】is made again.
藾

укрыться в тени дерева
